tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE literature_review_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE,
  abstract TEXT,
  keywords VARCHAR(255),
  citation_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE literature_reviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    publication_date DATE,
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE review_comments (
    comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    review_id UUID REFERENCES literature_reviews(review_id),
    commenter_name VARCHAR(100),
    comment_date TIMESTAMP,
    comment_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE review_ratings (
    rating_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    review_id UUID REFERENCES literature_reviews(review_id),
    rating INT CHECK (rating >= 1 AND rating <= 5),
    rating_date TIMESTAMP,
    reviewer VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Citations (
    citation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    citing_review_id INT,
    cited_review_id INT,
    citation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (citing_review_id) REFERENCES Literature(review_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (cited_review_id) REFERENCES Literature(review_id)
);

CREATE TABLE LiteratureReview (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    author TEXT,
    publication_year INT,
    abstract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Publications (
    publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    author_id INT,
    publication_year INT,
    abstract TEXT
);
